overview:
Rick Duggan is Director of Website Systems at Zappos IP, Inc. and a founding member of the VegasTech Community.

As Director of Website Systems, he is responsible for building the core technologies that power the Zappos family of web sites, including the API, shopping cart, search engine, and product catalog. He serves as mentor to VegasTech companies and is focused on community building.

He has been a member of five startups, including co-founder and VP of Engineering at Incanta and CTO of Thinker, Inc.

relationships.title: Co-founder & VP of Engineering and Operations
